title: Emerging Innovators Scholarship
eligibility: Undergraduate students pursuing STEM fields with demonstrated community leadership. First-generation preferred.

title: Future Educators Fellowship
eligibility: Aspiring educators committed to serving rural districts. Open to juniors and seniors.

title: Health Equity Scholars
eligibility: Graduate students focused on health equity, public policy, or community health initiatives.

title: Creative Futures Grant
eligibility: Artists and designers building community storytelling projects. Open to all academic levels.

title: Climate Resilience Award
eligibility: Students building climate resilience solutions in engineering or environmental science.

title: Civic Data Scholars
eligibility: Students using data science to solve civic challenges. Preference for projects with public agency partners.
